title: ninnai manamE nee
sahitya:
ninai manamE nI tIvinai tIravE guhanai



anupallavi



ninai ninai ninaindurugi unai marandu



caraNam



nIngum pini nIngum kali nIngum pala tIngum pugazh Ongum pugazh shelvam Ongum

AyuL

Ongum pAngAga gAngEyabhUSaNa guNa maNiyai pada kavi kunjaradAsan paintaru

cintAmaNiyai
